item.title: Freezing when I walk... Please someone help me
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Ok, so I followed a topic on the SilabSoft forums to fix the stupid beard glitch. Right? This is what the coding had.

In Client.Java…

Under:

public void newwelc() {

I put:

        pBeard=10;

Then in Player.java

I searched:

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pFeet); }

Then added:

if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard else playerProps.writeByte(0); }

So it looked like:

[code] if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

    }[/code]

So anyway, when I make an undercover account, I go to log in and I can see around. Then, I freeze if I try to walk…
Please help.
also, when I log in, I’m fine and I can talk. I do look retarded when I log in. All glitched up.

Read full topic
